project.name: Captcha-core
project.description:
CAPTCHA, for Completely Automated Public Turing Test Computers and Humans Apart, is a test based on several cognitives puzzles based on challenging problems of artificial intelligence. These tests are to prevent computer programs or robots to obtain information, by challenging with a problem that only human can resolve.

Several tests has been specified:

  • Gimpy: This test is based on distorted image and text. Gimpy randomly generate a distorted and corrupted text in an image, and asks to the user to type the word displayed in the image.
  • Sound: This test is based on distorted sound. It randomly generate a distorted sound and asks to user to type the word which was played.
  • Pix: This test randomly pick 6 images which have on object in common. Then it asks to user to type the object in common.
  • Bongo: This is a logical an memory test based on shape recognition.
